item.title: 1 Error, NPCHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Now this is going me on my nervs :mad:

NPCHandler.java:235: illegal start of expression public boolean IsInWorldMap(int coordX, int coordY) { ^ 1error

And my code looks like :

[code]}
/*/

public boolean IsInWorldMap(int coordX, int coordY)   }
	for (int i = 0; i < worldmap[0].length; i++) {
		if (worldmap[0][i] == coordX && worldmap[1][i] == coordY) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

Sure is getting me on the nervs… :mad: :mad:

I cant se the problem! Can you?
